alert.note: Alert for Stokes; Surry; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 9:42AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Surry, Stokes and central Yadkin Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 941 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Boonville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elkin... Fairview... Yadkinville... Jonesville... Dobson... Pilot Mountain... and Walnut Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
